title: MD
biography: Oswaldo Gonçalves Cruz, was a Brazilian physician, pioneer bacteriologist, epidemiologist and public health officer and the founder of the Oswaldo Cruz Institute.
aiSummary: Oswaldo Cruz is a public health specialist with an H-index of 128 at Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, Nature, JAMA. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
